amenities.description: Multiple outdoor swimming pools, children's play areas, landscaped gardens, and sunbathing areas.
amenities.title: Premium Amenities

architecture.description: Contemporary apartments with spacious bedrooms, equipped kitchens, private balconies and terraces with ocean views.
architecture.title: Modern Apartments

beachfront.description: Walking distance to Bouznika's fine sandy beaches, renowned for their cleanliness and gentle waves.
beachfront.title: Beach Access

location.description: Prime location in Bouznika, between Casablanca and Rabat, offering easy access to both major metropolitan areas of the Kingdom.
location.title: Prime Location

aboutHistory.paragraph1: Costa Beach is a modern and sought-after residential complex located in Bouznika, a coastal town between Casablanca and Rabat on Morocco's Atlantic coast. The development is popular with both Moroccan and international visitors for its blend of comfort, security, and proximity to the sea, making it ideal for family getaways, extended vacations, or weekend escapes.
aboutHistory.paragraph2: Costa Beach 3 is one of the newer phases of this development, offering enhanced amenities and a quiet, family-friendly environment. The complex is designed with relaxation and convenience in mind, providing residents and guests with a resort-like experience just steps from Bouznika's renowned sandy beaches.
aboutHistory.title: About Costa Beach and Costa Beach 3

landing.aboutSubtitle: A modern beachfront residential community in Bouznika, between Casablanca and Rabat

dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, register a property, or contact us for support.
dataCollection.title: Data Collection

dataRights.content: In accordance with Moroccan law, you have the following rights:

rights.access: Right of access to your personal data
rights.deletion: Right to erasure of your data
rights.rectification: Right to rectification of inaccurate data

dataRights.title: Your Rights

dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction.
dataSecurity.title: Data Security

dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.
dataSharing.title: Data Sharing

dataUsage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.
dataUsage.title: Data Usage

introduction.content: Costa Beach 3 is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data in accordance with Moroccan Law No. 09-08 relating to the protection of individuals with regard to the processing of personal data.
introduction.title: Introduction
